mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video(channel_id, url, public, thumbnail, title, info, location, age, views, like, hate, reply_count, date, category_id) VALUES( #{video.channelId}, #{video.url}, #{video.public}, #{video.thumbnail}, #{video.title}, #{video.info}, #{video.location}, #{video.age}, #{video.views}, #{video.like}, #{video.hate}, #{video.replyCount}, #{video.date}, #{video.categoryId} )
